title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: Learn about the EBRD's journey to investing more than €210 billion in over 7,500 projects. Our background and history · Our organisation · Our values · Strategies, governance and compliance · Project accountability · Back · Story of the EBRD · Basic documents establishing the Bank ·

title: Directors of the EBRD
snippet: He joined the EBRD in 2008 as a senior banker with the Corporate Equity team. In 2012, he became Director for Serbia, based in Belgrade, and in 2015, moved to Bucharest as the Director, Regional Head for Romania and Bulgaria.

title: EBRD: staff, structure, history
snippet: Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors, which has overall authority over the Bank. Our President is Odile Renaud-Basso (left). The President manages our work under the guidance of the Board of Directors.

title: EBRD President Odile Renaud-Basso
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the President of the EBRD, an office she has held since 2020.

title: Matteo Patrone
snippet: He joined the EBRD in 2008 as a senior banker with the Corporate Equity team. In 2012, he became Director for Serbia, based in Belgrade, and in 2015, moved to Bucharest as the Director, Regional Head for Romania and Bulgaria.
